title: Screenshot distorted/stretched if taken in landscape orientation using voice command
content: If I use the voice command: "take a screenshot" when in landscape orientation, the saved image is stretched horizontally and flipped upside down. This does not occur in portrait orientation, or if I use the buttons to take the screenshot. The first attached image was taken using the voice command, and the second with the hardware buttons.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
